attributes.action: Arrange for Long Tall Shorty to support Pope at the Borderline
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We urge the Prime Minister to do everything in his power to arrange for Long Tall Shorty to support Pope at the Borderline 19th April 2007.  We "the kids" have missed seeing Long Tall Shorty in a central London venue and are missing our monthly dose of "giffer punk" and it's simply not fair!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
